import React, { Component } from 'react'
class EditShowForm extends Component {
  render () {
    if(moment(show.entryStart).isAfter(moment())){
    return (
      <Formik
        render={({
        }) => (
          <Form onSubmit={handleSubmit}>
            <Row>
              <Col xs={6}>
                <FormGroup>
                  <Label>Name</Label>
                  <Field
                    type='text'
                    id='name'
                    name='name'
                    className='form-control'
                    required
                  />
                  {this.renderErrors(touched, errors, 'name')}
                </FormGroup>
                <FormGroup>
                  <Label>Description</Label>
                  <Field
                    component='textarea'
                    id='description'
                    name='description'
                    className='form-control'
                    rows={3}
                  />
                  {this.renderErrors(touched, errors, 'description')}
                </FormGroup>
                <FormGroup>
                  <Label>Individual Submission Limit</Label>
                  <Field
                    type='number'
                    min='1'
                    step='1'
                    id='entryCap'
                    name='entryCap'
                    className='form-control'
                    required
                  />
                  {this.renderErrors(touched, errors, 'entryCap')}
                </FormGroup>
              </Col>
